messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

remove from contracts signed last week newsletter contracts signed hello receiving past weeks unfortunately believe mailing information please thank contracts signed hello please find contracts contract name name contract order book margin duration mo date date variation updates ad phase extended envisioning setup va envisioning phase mobile application sox sow porting hosting sow pc agility decommission press mobile platform phase total contracts amounts total order book contracts amounts wish view contracts which signed please follow link contract contract afb cd thank
